data.title: Radio Stations
data.text:
On the Radio

This is the next best thing to a live gig...not really, but is much better than listening to [insert your own least favorite style of music].

Listen from your couch or whenever the mood hits you.

NOTE: This is obviously NOT all the stations where you can hear blues....it is just a sampling.

Tell us about your favorite station:

chicagoblues411@gmail.com

​​​​SUNDAY

89.3fm WNUR

​From the campus of Northwestern University in Evanston

2-5pm

Blues with Mike Baum, Liz Mandeville and Lynn Orman

91.5 KJZZ

NPR station in Phoenix​

ONLINE STREAMING kjzz.org

6pm -Midnight

Those Lowdown Blues with Bob Corritore​

1490am WPNA Time-brokered radio station

​licensed to Oak Park, IL Midnight – 2am

​Blue Midnight with John Gorny

MONDAY 4-6pm

Blues & News with Brother Jacob​

bluesandnews.com

NOTE: The best way to hear the show is using the links to past shows on the website listed above

​88.5fm WHPK Community radio from the University of Chicago 9pm – Midnight

The Evil Show with Dave Waldman
